### Tender Description

PWGSC on behalf of CSC is to retain a firm of Architects and its subcontractors for the provision of architectural services for the demolition of housing units BT04 and BT06 and the design and construction of a new 96-Bed Living Unit. This tender was done in two phases (Stage One - Phase One and Two), with all
